description:
CONTROLS

Click Left and Hold down to activate a sphere over a pedastral. Each pedastral has it's own effect.  Red activates the attack. Blue replenishes the shield. Green replenishes the health. Yellow crafts upgrades. Yellow activates the signal detector in the top right.

Aim: While red pedastral is active Scroll over the screen and use the number key 1 to adjust your crosshair onto the screen. Your canoneer will shoot by himself in the  given direction automatically and rhythmically.

Description

You are on an expedition through space and try to locate signals from the outside while you defend yourself against approaching asteroids.

Use of the limitation

 Everything in this game is synced to a 120bpm beat. 

CREDITS
